name: playframework
subtitle: Play Framework
about: Play is a high-productivity Java and Scala web application framework that integrates the components and APIs you need for modern web application development. Play is based on a lightweight, stateless, web-friendly architecture and features predictable and minimal resource consumption (CPU, memory, threads) for highly-scalable applications thanks to its reactive model, based on Iteratee IO.

videos.title: Introduction to Play Framework for Scala developers
videos.description: Play Framework makes it easy to build scalable, fast and real-time web applications with Java & Scala.

videos.title: Introduction to Play Framework for Java developers
videos.description: Play Framework makes it easy to build scalable, fast and real-time web applications with Java & Scala.

videos.title: Play All Day: Enterprise Web Development with Play and Scala
videos.description: In this session you will learn architecture strategies to help develop Play and Scala applications on large enterprise projects.The talk will cover strategies to help integrate Play with complex ecosystems and other enterprise development challenges.

videos.title: Play All Day: Reactive Streams and Play 3.0
videos.description: This presentation will dive deep into Play's architecture, and show just how reactive streams will be applied to and improve Play.

videos.title: Play All Day: Playing with Akka
videos.description: In this talk you will learn about how the Huffington Post leverages Akka inside of Play to build highly concurrent, low latency and fault tolerant applications to deal with process workflow and asynchronous integrations to various backend data sources.

videos.title: Optimizing Play for Production
videos.description: Play Framework is easy to deploy and scale but like any system some optimizations can help things run more smoothly. This webinar will teach you the basics of deployment, configuring thread pools, managing blocking, and common performance pitfalls.
